meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Anti</kanji> <kanji>aggression</kanji> is when you receive some aggression, then respond to it with anti aggression, aka your <vocabulary>counterattack</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
